definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
president (title of the head of state of China and several other nations)

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Wai4 hui4 Guan3 li3 ju2

definition: PRC State Development and Planning Committee, set up 1998 to replace State Planning Committee 國家計劃委員會|国家计划委员会, replaced in 2003 by National Development and Reform Commission 國家發展和改革委員會|国家发展和改革委员会

Guo2 jia1 Jing1 ji4 Mao4 yi4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: NH3-N and concentration of particles reached lnd standard of sewage treatment plant.
sentences.chinese: 濃度和濁度達到國家一級排放標準。

sentences.english: He pillaged the country of its treasures and of its best people.
sentences.chinese: 他掠奪了這個國家的財富和百姓中的精英。

sentences.english: Unlike those of the West, Chinese loans are "no strings attached."
sentences.chinese: 不象西方國家，中國的貸款是“無附帶條件”。

sentences.english: Port of Spain , on Trinidad , is the capital.
sentences.chinese: 特立尼達島上的西班牙港是國家的首都。

sentences.english: The reason Burundi is so poor is because they have never really had any peaceful time between the everlasting civil wars.
sentences.chinese: 這個國家貧窮的真正原因是因爲連綿不絕的內戰。

sentences.english: Whether to apply to any other CIML Member for a certificate?
sentences.chinese: 是否向其它國家的CIML委員有過申請？

sentences.english: Constitution is the national fundamental law, with supreme status.
sentences.chinese: 憲法是國家的根本法，具有至高無上的地位。

sentences.english: If the car does not yield to pedestrian, the car could be ticketed.
sentences.chinese: 大多數國家，如果車子不給行人讓路，會被抄罰單的。

sentences.english: The mobile phone has already enabled developing countries to skip fixed-line networks.
sentences.chinese: 移動電話已經使發展中國家跨越了固話網絡這個階段。

sentences.english: It was taken in Bromo National park.
sentences.chinese: 它拍攝於婆羅摩國家公園。

sentences.english: We are the country with five-thousand-year culture, old buildings are one of the evidences.
sentences.chinese: 我們是用五千年文化的國家，舊建築物的依據之一。

sentences.english: At the same time, banks in Western Europe are neck-deep in shaky loans to these countries.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，西歐銀行的貸款也深陷新興市場國家。

sentences.english: Today, many e-wastes added into national hazardous waste list.
sentences.chinese: 今天，許多電子廢物上了國家危險廢物名錄。

sentences.english: Russia has long wished to keep the West away from its backyard.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯長久以來都渴望讓西方國家遠離他的後院。

sentences.english: Onchocerciasis is limited to six Latin American countries.
sentences.chinese: 盤尾絲蟲病僅在6個拉丁美洲國家存在。

sentences.english: In opening wider to the outside world, we must pay great attention to safeguarding our national economic security.
sentences.chinese: 在擴大對外開放中，要十分注意維護國家經濟安全。

definition: variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]

local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
